name: InvoiceSense AI
tagline: A Google Workspace Add-on that automatically analyzes invoices stored in Google Drive using AI technology.
description: InvoiceSense AI is an intelligent add-on that automatically analyzes and extracts information from invoices stored in your Google Drive. It uses advanced AI technology to process PDF and image invoices, providing accurate data extraction, organization, and analysis capabilities to streamline your invoice management workflow.
shortDescription: Easily manage your personal finances. Automatically scan receipts, track expenses, and organize your budget with our user-friendly AI solution.

aiPoweredAnalysis.title: ü§ñ AI-Powered Analysis
items: Advanced OCR technology for text extraction
Support for multiple invoice formats and layouts

dataExtraction.title: üìä Data Extraction
items: Extract key information: vendor, amount, date, invoice number
Support for PDF and image invoices

steps.title: Open Google Drive
steps.description: In your browser, go to Google Drive

steps.title: Google Workspace Marketplace
steps.description: Search for "InvoiceSense AI" in the marketplace

steps.title: Install
steps.description: Click "Install" and follow the authorization prompts

processingInvoice.title: Processing an Invoice
items: Right-click on an invoice file in Google Drive
Select "InvoiceSense AI" from the context menu
Wait for AI analysis to complete
Review extracted information in the sidebar
Save or export the processed data

batchProcessing.title: Batch Processing
items: Manual: Select multiple invoices and process individually
Automatic: Set up folder monitoring (Standard and Premium plans)

dataManagement.title: Data Management
items: Set up custom field mappings (Standard and Premium plans)

features.title: Secure Data
features.description: All data remains in your Google account

features.title: No Data Transmission
features.description: No invoice data is transmitted to third parties

features.title: Google Compliance
features.description: Full compliance with Google's privacy policy

options.title: Support
options.description: Contact us through the add-on interface

options.title: API Documentation
options.description: Available for Standard and Premium plans
